content.text: Hi, I'm (name)! I'm really proud of myself for overcoming my fear of singing in front of people.
Hello, nice to meet you! I'm (name), and I play saxophone in a jazz band. I hope to finish my first novel before the end of the year.
That's awesome, I love music. I'm not in a band, but I like Bon Jovi and I've owned two Mustangs.
Thanks! I love Bon Jovi too. I'm more of a classic car guy, though. I love the sound of a classic car engine, it's like music to my ears.
Oh, I know what you mean. There's something really special about a classic car.
Yeah, they're just so cool. I'm glad my parents support my love of cars.
I'm glad my family supports my dreams of travel and photography.
That's great! Travel is amazing. I love going new places and seeing new things.
Me too! I've been to a few countries, but I'd love to travel more.
I know what you mean. There are so many places I want to see.
Well, it was nice chatting with you! I hope you have a great day!
You too! It was nice meeting you
